name: Zork0
body:
Here it is the web where i will upload all the changes of my own zork, a remake of the original one but environmented on a lost isle where the goal is to turn on the lighthouse to be able to be seen by any ship around.
I'll give below a link to play the original zork and my first sketch of what would be the isle.



[Link of the original Zork](http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/5zyoqrsugeopel3ffhz_vq/zork)

![Drawn Map](https://github.com/BooLAW/Zork0.git)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
